schemes.name: Rythu Bandhu (Farmer Investment Support Scheme)
schemes.description: Direct investment support for farmers to purchase inputs for crop cultivation
schemes.benefit: Rs 10,000 per acre per year (Rs 5,000 per season for Kharif and Rabi)
application_steps: Receive bearer cheque or direct bank transfer

schemes.name: Rythu Bima (Farmer Life Insurance Scheme)
schemes.description: Free life insurance coverage for enrolled farmers in Telangana
schemes.benefit: Rs 5,00,000 life insurance coverage; premium paid by state government
application_steps: Verify nominee details at Agriculture office

schemes.name: Telangana Micro Irrigation Project (TMIP)
schemes.description: Subsidy for drip and sprinkler irrigation systems to improve water use efficiency
schemes.benefit: Up to 90% subsidy on drip/sprinkler systems for SC/ST farmers; 80% for others
eligibility: Priority for small and marginal farmers
application_steps: Apply at District Horticulture Office or online portal

schemes.name: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi (PM-KISAN)
schemes.description: Central government income support scheme for all land-holding farmer families
schemes.benefit: Rs 6,000 per year in 3 equal installments of Rs 2,000 each
eligibility: All farmer families with cultivable landholding
application_steps: Register at pmkisan.gov.in or visit Common Service Centre

schemes.name: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (PMFBY)
schemes.description: Crop insurance scheme providing coverage against natural calamities, pests and diseases
schemes.benefit: Insurance coverage for crop loss due to natural disasters at subsidized premium
eligibility: Loanee and non-loanee farmers growing notified crops
application_steps: Apply through bank or PMFBY portal before cut-off date

schemes.name: Kisan Credit Card (KCC)
schemes.description: Affordable credit facility for farmers to meet cultivation and other agricultural needs
schemes.benefit: Working capital loans at 4% interest (with prompt repayment); interest subvention
application_steps: Credit limit sanctioned based on land holding

schemes.name: Telangana State Seed Development Corporation (TSSDC)
schemes.description: Supply of quality certified seeds at subsidized rates to farmers
schemes.benefit: High-quality seeds for rice, cotton, maize, pulses and oilseeds at subsidized prices
application_steps: Visit nearest TSSDC outlet or mandal agriculture office

schemes.name: Mission Kakatiya
schemes.description: Restoration of tanks and water bodies to improve irrigation across Telangana
schemes.benefit: Increased irrigation coverage; desilting and repair of minor irrigation tanks
eligibility: All farmers near restored tanks benefit from improved irrigation
documents: No individual application needed; village/mandal-level implementation
application_steps: Farmers benefit from increased water storage

schemes.name: E-NAM (National Agriculture Market)
schemes.description: Online trading platform connecting agricultural mandis for transparent price discovery
schemes.benefit: Better prices through competitive bidding; transparent market access
eligibility: Farmers registered in e-NAM enabled mandis
application_steps: Register at nearby e-NAM enabled mandi

schemes.name: Agriculture Infrastructure Fund (AIF)
schemes.description: Credit facility for post-harvest management infrastructure and community farming assets
schemes.benefit: 3% interest subvention on loans up to Rs 2 crore; credit guarantee coverage
application_steps: Apply on AIF portal or through bank

schemes.name: PM-KUSUM (Solar Pump Scheme)
schemes.description: Solar energy solutions for farmers including solar pumps and grid-connected systems
schemes.benefit: Subsidy on solar pumps; option to sell surplus solar power to grid
eligibility: Farmers with valid land records (state criteria apply)
application_steps: Select solar pump capacity and vendor

schemes.name: Sub-Mission on Agricultural Mechanization (SMAM)
schemes.description: Subsidy on purchase of agricultural machinery and equipment
schemes.benefit: 40-50% subsidy on tractors, harvesters, rotavators and other farm equipment

schemes.name: Telangana Sheep Distribution Scheme
schemes.description: Free distribution of sheep units to eligible beneficiaries for livelihood support
schemes.benefit: 20+1 sheep unit (20 ewes + 1 ram) distributed free to each beneficiary
eligibility: Golla/Kuruma and other traditional shepherd communities
application_steps: Apply at District Animal Husbandry Office

schemes.name: Soil Health Card Scheme
schemes.description: Free soil testing and nutrient-based fertilizer recommendations for farmers
schemes.benefit: Soil health report with crop-wise fertilizer recommendations every 2 years
application_steps: Contact nearest soil testing lab or Agriculture Office
Provide soil sample from your field
Receive Soil Health Card with recommendations

schemes.name: Minimum Support Price (MSP) Procurement
schemes.description: Government procurement of crops at guaranteed minimum support price
schemes.benefit: Assured price for notified crops; protection against price crashes
application_steps: Register at nearest procurement center before season

schemes.name: National Horticulture Mission (NHM)
schemes.description: Support for horticulture development including fruits, vegetables, spices and flowers
schemes.benefit: Planting material subsidy; infrastructure support for pack houses and cold storage
application_steps: Subsidy for planting material and infrastructure

schemes.name: Telangana Fisheries Development
schemes.description: Support for inland fish farming in Telangana tanks and ponds
schemes.benefit: Subsidized fish seed, feed and equipment; training for fish farmers
eligibility: SC/ST/BC and women fish farmers get priority
application_steps: Receive fish seed and feed support

schemes.name: Paramparagat Krishi Vikas Yojana (PKVY) - Organic Farming
schemes.description: Promoting organic farming through cluster approach with certification support
schemes.benefit: Rs 50,000 per hectare over 3 years for organic inputs and certification
application_steps: Form a farmer cluster in your village
Receive organic input support and training

schemes.name: Dharani Portal (Land Records Management)
schemes.description: Integrated land records management system for Telangana with online property transactions
schemes.benefit: Online access to land records; hassle-free property registrations and mutations
application_steps: Apply for mutation or registration online
Visit MRO office for final verification

schemes.name: National Mission on Sustainable Agriculture (NMSA)
schemes.description: Promoting climate-smart agriculture practices and rainfed area development
schemes.benefit: Support for soil health management, water harvesting and climate-resilient farming
application_steps: Apply for specific components like soil health or water harvesting
